definition: (particle in old Chinese similar to 啊)
(particle used to exaggerate certain adjectives, in particular 神經兮兮|神经兮兮, 髒兮兮|脏兮兮, 可憐兮兮|可怜兮兮, and 慘兮兮|惨兮兮)
(particle used to exaggerate certain adjectives, in particular 神經兮兮|神经兮兮, 髒兮兮|脏兮兮, 可憐兮兮|可怜兮兮, and 慘兮兮|惨兮兮)

sentences.english: Eight is for a nice warm bed.
Liver beingbosom-friends with courage (gallbladder), makes peace with Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 肝膽兮相照，和平兮中國。

sentences.english: Liver beingbosom-friends with courage (gallbladder), makes peace with Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 肝膽兮相照，和平兮中國。

sentences.english: Take out that to throw from the breast to thousand if Xi, week after gentleman no longer lecture.
sentences.chinese: 從懷中掏出那封祕卷扔向千若兮，周繼君不再言語。

sentences.english: I only use one single head.
sentences.chinese: 我用一頭顱兮而無萬夫。

sentences.english: The east wind drifts and god sends down rain.
sentences.chinese: 杳冥冥兮羌晝晦，東風飄兮神靈雨。

sentences.english: You are shy as a rabbit.
The morning drink magnolia dew, for dinner autumn chrysanthemum so was borne.
sentences.chinese: 朝飲木蘭之墜露兮，夕餐秋菊之落英。

sentences.english: From magnolia I drink the dew, oh!
Just like yesterday , which can never return .
sentences.chinese: 就像昨天，如壯士一去兮不復還。

sentences.english: In this group of poems, several themes can be educed.
sentences.chinese: 這一組詩歌可以離析蘇若兮詩歌的出幾個主題。

sentences.english: It seems old is slowly catching up with me.
A gale has risen and is sweeping the clouds across the sky.
The isles of Greece, the isles of Greece!
Hometown I see none, but lives forever in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 家鄉不可見兮，不能相忘。

definition: On Encountering Sorrow, poem by Qu Yuan 屈原[Qu1 Yuan2] in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞[Chu3 ci2]
sublime/solitary/distant or remote/to gaze off into the distance
variant of 飄搖|飘摇[piao1 yao2]
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
watchtower on either side of a city gate/(literary) city/imperial palace
